[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@datashaper/react](./react.md) &gt; [StepSelector](./react.stepselector.md)

## StepSelector variable

Creates a custom step selection dropdown. If "showButton" is true, a + icon will appear next to the dropdown, and onChange will only fire when it is clicked.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
StepSelector: React.FC<StepSelectorProps>
```
